title: Operation Hope Founder and CEO on New Book
itunes:title: Operation Hope Founder and CEO on New Book
description:
John Hope Bryant, Founder and Chief Executive Officer at Operation Hope, discusses his new book "Up from Nothing.” He points out the need for solutions that are larger than the problems within society.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
